name: Epenesa O Samoa - Senior Program
description: Epenesa O Samoa is a place for seniors to meet, fellowship and receive support all in a warm, friendly and safe environment. The program is open to all seniors ages 60 and above, and anyone 59 years and under with a permanent disability.
fullDescription: Epenesa O Samoa is a place for seniors to meet, fellowship and receive support all in a warm, friendly and safe environment. The program is open to all seniors ages 60 and above, and anyone 59 years and under with a permanent disability.
whatTheyOffer: Epenesa O Samoa is a place for seniors to meet, fellowship and receive support all in a warm, friendly and safe environment. The program is open to all seniors ages 60 and above, and anyone 59 years and under with a permanent disability.
keywords: congregate meals for seniors and people with disabilities
